summary: A politically-minded enforcer's misguided trust in his lieutenant leads him to suspect his wife of infidelity in this adaptation of Shakespeare's 'Othello'.
cast: Ajay Devgn|Kareena Kapoor|Saif Ali Khan|Konkona Sen Sharma|Vivek Oberoi|Bipasha Basu|Naseeruddin Shah|Deepak Dobriyal|Pankaj Tripathi|Kamal Tiwari|Manav Kaushik|Avtar Sahani|Santosh Kaushik|Rahul Kumar
keywords: character name as title|one word title|bad guy wins|marriage|jealousy
title: Omkara
